job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Description:

·      The Screenings Team aims to increase user safety, reduce the frequency of property damage incidents, and help maintain our brand.

·      We perform background checks and other data searches to score a user's risk.

 

Requirements:

·      3+ years of data science, data analytics, or business intelligence experience

·      Strong understanding of SQL

·      Experience conducting data analysis in Python

·      Experience building clear and easy to understand dashboards and presentations

·      Ability to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levels

·      Ability to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to appropriate and accurate insights

·      BS/BA in CS or related field

Preferred Qualifications:

o  Prior experience at a major tech company and/or in management consulting

o  Familiarity with Superset

o  Familiarity with running weblab experiments, efficacy studies, or product validation tests

o  Familiarity with machine learning basics

o  Familiarity with our infrastructure, including Airflow, Presto SQL, and Hive SQL

o  Experience creating and maintaining data pipelines

o  Experience supporting engineering product work

o  MS/MA in CS or related field
